GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 19 August 2023
Except  for  a  few  showers  in  Western  and  Sabaragamuwa  provinces  and  in  Galle  and  Matara
districts, mainly fair weather will prevail over most parts of the Island.
Fairly strong winds about (40-45) kmph can be expected at times in western slopes of the central
hills, Northern, North-Central and North-Western provinces, and in Trincomalee, Hambantota and
Monaragala districts.

Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
